title: Cryptornd
author: Cryptornd
content: Average price on amazon is about $18. incredible book For bitcoiners . everyone must read and understand bitcoin . published on march 23 , 2018 AndWritten By Dr.saifedean.download book for Free from Link Below. https://drive.google.com/file/d/1P8ABuksouHMueVC_hTgDnCYXlwV5Tr2P/view?usp=drivesdk

comments.author: Upgrade00
comments.body: Thumbs up providing a free copy, but I would much rather users downloaded it for themselves, for a couple of reasons;• There is a security risk from downloading random files over the internet, and users should not be encouraged to do that,• This is an intellectual property of the author, and they get a percentage from sales on Amazon; They should not be denied that.

comments.author: Cryptornd
comments.body: Quote from: Upgrade00 on July 15, 2022, 07:43:05 AMThumbs up providing a free copy, but I would much rather users downloaded it for themselves, for a couple of reasons;• There is a security risk from downloading random files over the internet, and users should not be encouraged to do that,• Also, this is an intellectual property of the author, and they get a percentage of sales on Amazon. They should not be denied that. agree with you. But my purpose is to provide something valuable for people . This was given to me by famous bitcoin traveler Hitesh ( paco de la ) As a gift. so i made it a re gift here .

comments.author: SquirrelJulietGarden
comments.body: [LIST] Big Library of Bitcoin & Blockchain Books[RESOURCES] Free bitcoin/blockchain/finance eBook.Mastering Bitcoin. Free on Github.

comments.author: hugeblack
comments.body: Quote from: Cryptornd on July 15, 2022, 07:45:30 AMagree with you. But my purpose is to provide something valuable for people . This was given to me by famous bitcoin traveler Hitesh ( paco de la ) As a gift. so i made it a re gift here .Thank you for your effort, but preserving the right of the writer is a beautiful thing, especially since the book is available in official copies here --> https://saifedean.com/thebitcoinstandard/ and for audio book ---> https://www.audible.com/pd/The-Bitcoin-Standard-Audiobook/B07D7ZRKLJWhat is surprising is that the book cover design is the same among many translations, except for China and some countries. Does anyone know the reason?

comments.author: NotATether
comments.body: It's not that we don't like free stuff, but we basically do not want to be seen as a piracy board, so you should remove the link before some DMCA guy knocks on theymos's email address.Quote from: Upgrade00 on July 15, 2022, 07:43:05 AM This is an intellectual property of the author, and they get a percentage from sales on Amazon; They should not be denied that.

comments.author: cheezcarls
comments.body: I could have got my hands on this book for free during the Token 2049 event in Hongkong years ago but I have missed the opportunity since they only have limited copies to give out back then.I don't know man but personally I don't want to download it unless you've got an official permission from the author himself and not from a third party. It's a huge risk for sharing free download link like this book without a confirmed permission or being authorized by the author. Once that author officially authorize you for that, then it's good. But if not, you could be in trouble in the future once the author finds out.

comments.author: barbara44
comments.body: Quote from: Cryptornd on July 15, 2022, 07:45:30 AMmy purpose is to provide something valuable for people . The book is indeed valuable but I think it already loses its value the moment you share it here for free. The price of the book was only 18 dollars anyway and I think that was not heavy compared to the quality and the knowledge that you will be getting on this book. Once you master it, it will now be easy for you to earn money through bitcoin and you can easily recover the money you spend here. Quote from: Cryptornd on July 15, 2022, 07:45:30 AMThis was given to me by famous bitcoin traveler Hitesh ( paco de la ) As a gift. so i made it a re gift here .If the guy was a famous bitcoiner then everything that he gave to you has a sentimental value so you shouldn't gave it away just like that. There must be free bitcoin books out there and that's the one that you should share here and not those who are paid ones because that's kinda illegal.

comments.author: hd49728
comments.body: Yet another free eBook, Cryptoeconomics[RESOURCES] Free bitcoin/blockchain/finance eBook.Some book authors give free versions to read on Github.
